summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the federal Local Law Enforcement Block Grant program; authorizing the execution of agreements under which the City will receive financial assistance from the US Department of Justice (DOJ), Bureau of Justice Assistance (BJA); authorizing an application for allocation of funds under those agreements; accepting the money when received; and increasing appropriations to the Police Department and the Human Services Department in the 2004 Budget; all by a three- fourths vote of the City Council.
